name: Hell: Idle Evil Tycoon
description:
Have you ever dreamed of become powerful (D)evil Master? Now you can make your dreams come true!

Build your own hell empire, make billions and have fun! Use many idle clicker mechanics and become a Darkness Tycoon.

Features:
- Many different punishments to buy!
- Play in AR Mode!
- Enjoy beautiful graphics
- Upgrade punishments
- Manage your hell so everything works optimally
- Get hundreds of sinners to punish and earn money
- Collect gold and grow your Kingdom!
- Get VIP sinner to fly on Dragon to your hell
- Intuitive gameplay with clicker mechanics!
- Offline game - no internet connection needed!
